title: David Blaine sews his mouth shut -literally- in front of Jimmy Fallon and Priyanka Chopra

meta_data.description: - David Blaine sews his mouth shut and performs a card trick. - Priyanka, Jimmy and The Roots can't believe it. - Jimmy Fallon remains annoying. Priyanka is adorable and funny. Source . Priyanka is adorable in this. I hope she moves to comedy after Quantico. ONTD, your favorite magic trick?
